marklogic.body: I don\'t have a heavy duty yet but I do have a latin machete and a norse hawk hatchet from Cold steel. When I do get a heavy duty Ax it will probably be from them also. I have several items from them. All of them are quality items that will last through a life time of heavy use. It\'s only my opinion but I think that Cold Steel makes some of the best mass market cutting tools out there. You should check out there website at www.coldsteel.com

object.displayName: Comment on Survival Choppers - Understanding Axe Types by Corwin46
